title: [3DS] Dragon Quest VIII [JPN]
description:
This is 3DS ROM #1928

Japanese name: Dragon Quest VIII Sora to Umi to Daichi to Norowareshi Himegimi

Translated jap name: Dragon Quest VIII: The Sky, the Ocean, the Earth, and the Cursed Princess

English name: Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King

Released for the 3DS in Japan on August 27, 2015.

This is the japanese version, and japanese language..

In the 3DS version, the player can choose in both endings if the protagonist lives with Medea or Jessica..

The 3DS version also has japanese voices for the characters (the original PS2 japanese version had no voices for the characters).. So now you can finally hear what they sound like I guess..

Unfortunately, square-enix did not port this game using the 3D feature that the 3DS possesses.. So even though the world is rendered in 3D, it doesn't actually pop out of the 3DS screen.. It is like having the 3DS switch set to 2D mode..

This is a single .3ds file inside of a .7z archive file..

You need a gateway card or maybe some type of CFW to get this to work.. And you need a 3DS with lower version sysnand firmware..

I have confirmed it to work at least with this set up:
new-3DS
sysnand: 9.2.0
emunand: 9.2.0
gateway launcher software version 3.4.1
